subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Track
lead_paragraph: Lea said in a letter posted on his website that he had taken the prescription painkiller Percocet, which contains the banned substance oxycodone, to help him sleep.
snippet: Lea said in a letter posted on his website that he had taken the prescription painkiller Percocet, which contains the banned substance oxycodone, to help him sleep.
